logisim.changelog: * New movement system: there are no more scrollbars and the size of the canvas is almost infinite; you can move it by dragging with poke tool or by dragging with mouse wheel clicked * Auto zooming and centering: each time you'll open a new file or circuit, Logisim will center and zoom it for you, you can call this new function whenever you want with Ctrl-0 / Double mouse wheel click * Arrows around the canvas indicate you where the circuit is if it's outside of your view * If there is at least 1 arrow visible, a button will pop up and, if you click it, you'll call the the auto zoom / centering function * Updating to this version you'll accept to send data about Logisim usage (visible on http://logisim.altervista.org/) You can disable it in Preference / Fork * Fixed opening new file in new window bug when the old window wasn't dirty * Fixed zoom with mouse wheel bug on old frames after opening a new file * Better zoom function * Small fixes about Threads conflicts
